src_original: bar gyur/_/de tshhe rigs kyi phyag mtshhan mdzes/_/mgon po sku'i rdo rje bzhengs/_/

ni/_/'du shes kyi ni phung por bzhugs/_/mched pa kun gyi rdo rje ni/_/
